Abstract: This dataset contains multi-baseline Polarimetric Interferometric Synthetic Aperture Radar SLC (single-look-complex) data collected from multiple repeat-pass flights over Gabonese forests using the Uninhabited Aerial Vehicle Synthetic Aperture Radar (UAVSAR) instrument in February-March 2016. Supplementary data products based on various intermediate parameters of the UAVSAR data are provided and include viewing and terrain geometry.

RelatedUrls.Description: This paper describes a machine learning approach to improved estimations of tropical forest canopy height utilizing this UAVSAR data
This link allows direct data access via the MAAP data archive

Instruments.LongName: Uninhabited Aerial Vehicle Synthetic Aperture Radar

DataCenters.LongName: Multi-Mission Algorithm and Analysis Platform Data Management Team

CollectionCitations.Title: AfriSAR UAVSAR Coregistered SLCs Generated Using NISAR Tools
CollectionCitations.Creator: Marco Lavalle

AdditionalAttributes.Name: Geolocated
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Denotes whether the data is geolocated

AdditionalAttributes.Name: Polarization
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Transmit and receive polarization specification for the SAR file

AdditionalAttributes.Name: Band Center Frequency
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Central transmission frequency of the instrument

AdditionalAttributes.Name: Swath Width
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Earth surface distance observed by the instrument

AdditionalAttributes.Name: Spatial Resolution
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Ground area imaged by a sensors instantaneous field of view

AdditionalAttributes.Name: Flight Number
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Unique number to identify an individual aircraft flight

AdditionalAttributes.Name: Track Number
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Number indicating the flight line of the flight data acquisition was from.  Typically counted sequentially from the beginning of a flight.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: Frequency Band Name
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Traditional IEEE names utilized to describe a range of frequencies or wavelengths

AdditionalAttributes.Name: Site Name
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Geographic description of the location under observation

AdditionalAttributes.Name: Data Format
AdditionalAttributes.Description: File format of the data for this granule

Quality: Correct program termination and visual inspection ensured quality of the data. There are no quality flags.
EntryTitle: AfriSAR UAVSAR Coregistered SLCs Generated Using NISAR Tools
